dcterms:description: A diverse large-scale dataset designed for urban scene semantic segmentation, derived from video sequences recorded in the streets of 50 cities, containing 5K images with high-quality pixel-level annotations and 20K images with coarse annotations.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset
